text: Mai Tai Sing (December 22, 1923 â€“ July 11, 2018) was an American actress, dancer and businesswoman. She was born in Oakland, California. She was known for her roles in Hong Kong, Forbidden, Strange Portrait and The New Adventures of China Smith. Sing died in Honolulu, Hawaii on July 11, 2018 from heart disease, aged 94.Mai Tai Sing, pioneering Chinese American entertainer, dies at 94 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1923 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American dancers Category:Actors from Oakland, California Category:Businesspeople from California
title: Mai Tai Sing
